definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: During the repast, she had occasion to speak severed times.
sentences.chinese: 喫飯的時刻，她才得空好幾次開口說話。

sentences.english: I haven't had time to look at your essay yet.
sentences.chinese: 我還未得空仔細地讀你的文章。

sentences.english: Come and see us any moment you can.
sentences.chinese: 什麼時候得空請來看看我們。

sentences.english: There is no paradise on earth equal to the union of love and innocence .
sentences.chinese: 人間最大的幸福莫如既有愛情又清白得空。

sentences.english: She’s going to be busy for 20 years.
sentences.chinese: 她將要忙活20年纔會得空。

sentences.english: Have you had a chance to look at the report?
sentences.chinese: 您得空兒看那個報告了嗎？

definition: to take some time out/to make use of a spare moment
at leisure/idle/to have nothing to do
to (try to) find the time to
to snatch a moment of leisure/to take a break from work
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
